name: New Age
description: Broad genre centered on peaceful, meditative melodies, using a wide variety of instrumentation.

sub_genres.name: Andean New Age
sub_genres.description: Takes heavy influence from Indigenous Andean Music, emphasizing a peaceful and harmonious atmosphere and often using the flute.

sub_genres.name: Celtic New Age
sub_genres.description: Incorporates influences and performing styles from Celtic Folk Music, emphasizing pastoral imagery and wistful themes.

sub_genres.name: Native American New Age
sub_genres.description: Takes heavy influence from Indigenous North American Music, emphasizing a peaceful and harmonious atmosphere and utilizing chants, drumming, and flutes.

sub_genres.name: Neoclassical New Age
sub_genres.description: Strongly influenced by and sometimes also based upon early music and the Baroque Music or Classical Period.

sub_genres.name: New Age Kirtan
sub_genres.description: American development of Kirtan, fusing it with New Age and Western music.

sub_genres.name: Tibetan New Age
sub_genres.description: Incorporates perceived elements of Tibetan Music, particularly singing bowls.
